title: Purpose of travel as depicted in illustration

content.question: Which of the following best describes the primary purpose of the travel depicted in the illustration?

choices.label: To convert peoples of other faiths to Islam
To recruit soldiers for the Caliphate
To bind diverse communities to a common tradition

content.answer: To bind diverse communities to a common tradition
